articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: After a widely-publicized acquisition attempt by Kanye West collapsed, Starboard Digital Media acquired the social media platform.
articles.title: Parler Shut Down for Reboot Under New Owner—And It's Not Kanye West

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Four days after the Shanghai upgrade and there are still more than 100,000 validators that need to update if they want to leave the network.
articles.title: $598M in Ethereum Still Waiting on Updated Withdrawal Credentials: Nansen

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The hit game’s new items come in limited quantities and can be resold, with creator royalties enforced. But Roblox isn't using NFTs.
articles.title: Roblox Adds Rare, Resellable Digital Items—But They’re Not NFTs

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Community Gaming CEO Chris Gonsalves said the layoffs are necessary for the firm to have “a stronger future.”
articles.title: Web3 Startup Community Gaming Confirms Layoffs Amid Esports Downturn

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Gary Gensler today made clear that many decentralized crypto trading platforms are already "exchanges" in the SEC's view—and must therefore comply.
articles.title: SEC’s Hester Peirce Says Gensler’s Plan to Target DeFi Undermines First Amendment

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Marathon CEO Fred Thiel said the company's expansion continues unabated, and it plans to develop new mining sites in Texas.
articles.title: Marathon Digital CEO: Bitcoin Mining Bill 'Won’t Change Our Minds About Texas'

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: AI researchers created 25 “generative agents” in a virtual town they called Smallville. Curious behaviors started to emerge.
articles.title: These Are Your Sims. And These Are Your Sims on ChatGPT

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Kirstin Smith took to Twitter to detail the experience at Liberia airport.
articles.title: Blockchain Association CEO Detained in Costa Rica Is Back Home

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Dystopian sci-fi series RZR, currently in post-production, will premiere exclusively on the Gala Film platform this July.
articles.title: Danny Trejo, Mena Suvari Join Gala's Web3 TV Series, 'RZR'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: After the company behind the Chia blockchain submitted a confidential draft registration to go public, the project's token has soared.
articles.title: XCH Token Soars 12% After Chia Signals Interest in Going Public

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly,Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Amid concerns over mass withdrawals, in the last 24 hours, roughly 94,800 Ethereum has been deposited to the network.
articles.title: $198M in Ethereum Staked to Network in Last 24 Hours

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The Department of Justice thinks there's something illegal about Google's exclusivity deals now that it has a monopoly on the search market.
articles.title: DOJ Claims Google’s Search Engine 'Monopoly' Stifled AI Innovation: Report

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Singapore-based crypto exchange Bitrue has been hit by a security breach, draining a hot wallet of $23 million in various assets.
articles.title: Hacker Robs Crypto Exchange Bitrue of $23M in Ethereum, SHIB, Other Assets

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Propelled by the latest Shanghai upgrade, the price of Ethereum has recaptured the $2,100 mark last seen in May 2022.
articles.title: Ethereum Soars to 11-Month High Following Shanghai Upgrade

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Goblintown NFTs went viral last year after holders rambled about piss. Now some NFT traders are unhappy with the creator's surprise moves.
articles.title: Goblintown Creator Trashes NFT Artwork, Disables Trading in Royalties Stand

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The token’s price doubled yesterday, yet its recent gains have now been partially pared back.
articles.title: FTX Token Slides as Holder Hopes of Exchange Reopening Fade

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: The “decentralized Amazon” shut down in 2020 from a lack of funding—now it’s poised to make a come back.
articles.title: Bitcoin Marketplace OpenBazaar Is Coming Back

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Credit card giant Mastercard has started a Web3 artist accelerator, with free Polygon-based NFTs that provide benefits ahead.
articles.title: Mastercard Drops Free Music Pass NFTs With Perks for Holders

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The original meme coin is today's best performing top 20 digital asset.
articles.title: Dogecoin Leads Crypto Market Surge, Up 6% in 24 Hours

articles.description: Anthony Scaramucci of hedge fund SkyBridge Capital got burned by Sam Bankman-Fried: he co-hosted SALT conferences with FTX and sold a 30% stake in SkyBridge to FTX Ventures. And yet "The Mooch" tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott "I'm more bullish now than I have ever been" on crypto as an investment case. He discusses his frustration with SBF, how wrong he thinks politicians like Elizabeth Warren and Gary Gensler are about crypto and how to regulate it, what he sees happening next with adoption, and talks about Trump. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Anthony Scaramucci Is More Bullish on Bitcoin Than Ever

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Armstrong said lawyer Adam Moskowitz and his firm “will be dealt with” in response.
articles.title: YouTuber Bitboy Ordered to Appear in Court to Face Lawyer’s Harassment Claims

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The camera and digital imaging giant is pushing further into Web3 with a dedicated NFT photography platform.
articles.title: Canon to Launch Ethereum Photo NFT Marketplace Cadabra

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Solana’s Android phone is here, delivering a premium flagship with baked-in Web3 functionality. Can it hook the masses?
articles.title: Solana Saga Review: The Web3 Smartphone Has Arrived

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: Chaos-GPT, an autonomous implementation of ChatGPT, has been unveiled, and its objectives are as terrifying as they are well-structured.
articles.title: Meet Chaos-GPT: An AI Tool That Seeks to Destroy Humanity

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: When it comes to Web3, a new study suggests a free-to-play mobile game has incredible potential in the burgeoning Japanese market.
articles.title: Asia Could Dominate 80% of Web3 Gaming: Report

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Uniswap’s open-source mobile wallet app allows users to trade on Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, and Optimism.
articles.title: Uniswap Wallet Goes Live on iOS After Apple App Store Challenges

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Twitter has partnered with trading app eToro as the microblogging site's CEO pivots his company towards becoming an "everything app."
articles.title: eToro Announces Crypto, Stock Trading Integration With Twitter

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Following the successful execution of Ethereum's latest upgrade, the network's native asset ETH has soared overnight.
articles.title: Ethereum Surges 6% Following Successful Shanghai Upgrade

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: An attacker minted 1.2 quadrillion tokens by exploiting a Yearn vulnerability, selling them for $11.6 million in stablecoins.
articles.title: Older Version of DeFi Yield Aggregator Yearn Finance Exploited for $11.6M

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The virtual church from Nadya Tolokonnikova and Metajuice will feature NFTs and special events, supporting LGBTQIA+ causes.
articles.title: Pussy Riot Pitches Metaverse ‘Utopia’ With Virtual Social Network IMVU

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: After settling with the SEC, Kraken is among the firms in line to fully exit as a network validator.
articles.title: Shanghai Arrival Could Push Major Players to Disembark

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: ETH's price was remarkably stable in the minutes following Ethereum's historic, successful Shanghai upgrade, which enabled withdrawals of staked ETH.
articles.title: Ethereum Holds Steady Following Shanghai, Defying Expectations

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The free web and mobile chatbot offers many benefits, including links and sources for its answers.
articles.title: Perplexity AI: The Chatbot Stepping Up to Challenge ChatGPT

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Wednesday night’s long-awaited Shanghai upgrade marks a major milestone for the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap.
articles.title: Ethereum Shanghai Upgrade Goes Live, Unlocking $34 Billion in Staked ETH

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: What does big money think of the latest Ethereum upgrade? Experts weigh in.
articles.title: How Shanghai Could Change Institutional Appetite for Ethereum

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The “Oracle of Omaha” made up his mind about crypto long ago, it seems.
articles.title: Warren Buffett Blasts Bitcoin as 'Gambling Token' as BTC Surges 35% in 30 Days

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: At a Beverly Hills gala hosted by street artist Mr. Brainwash, social media influencers pondered the future—and the place for Web3 in it.
articles.title: Mr. Brainwash, 100 Influencers, and Web3 Walk Into a Museum

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: For the next month, the hunt is on for virtual music amidst dead-end viruses.
articles.title: LimeWire Launches Nostalgic Music Downloading Game With Crypto Rewards

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: Analytics companies make a living tracking Bitcoin transactions. Developer Dan Gould wants to make their lives harder with PayJoins.
articles.title: Bitcoin Privacy Tool Aims to 'Confuse' Surveillance Companies

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: A new, uncensored open-source large language model is being used by the AI community to build X-rated chatbots, because of course it is.
articles.title: AI Sex Chatbots and the Dudes Who Love Them

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly,Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: On-chain analysis from Glassnode estimates that roughly 170,000 ETH will be withdrawn and sold after the Shanghai upgrade.
articles.title: More Than $300 Million in Ethereum Will Be Sold After Shanghai, Analysts Say

articles.description: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer Paul Grewal discussed the "Howey Test," which the SEC uses as its yard stick for whether a crypto asset should be regulated as a security, and told Decrypt's Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts the issue with it isn't that it's old (the case is from 1946) but how it's being applied to modern technology. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer: The Problem With SEC's Howey Test Isn't Its Age

articles.description: Leo Matchett from Web3 film funding platform Decentralized Pictures tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA about DCP's just announced iPhone Filmmaking Initiative, which will support aspiring filmmakers who create a short film on their iPhones, and will be determined via DCP's crypto-native on-chain voting system.
articles.title: Decentralized Pictures Plots Its Next Web3 Grant for Filmmakers

articles.description: Web3 gaming YouTuber CryptoStache talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA about why Web3 gaming will bring NFTs mainstream, the partnerships that prove it's already happening, how gamers will change their tune on NFTs, and how the terminology is likely to change.
articles.title: Web3 YouTuber CryptoStache: Gaming Will Be the Catalyst That Takes NFTs Mainstream

articles.description: Steve H., VP of sales from Fordefi, which raised $18 million in funding last year, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Outer Edge LA how Fordefi uses multi-party computation to make signing transactions on an institutional crypto wallet much simpler—no seed phrase needed.
articles.title: Fordefi Aims to Dramatically Simplify the Institutional Crypto Wallet

articles.description: Toronto-based Bitcoin mining company Hut 8 recently announced a merger with U.S. Bitcoin Corp that will take it into Texas, Nebraska, and New York. Hut 8 CEO Jaime Leverton joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk expanding into the U.S., dealing with regulatory pushback post-FTX, why Texas is such a hotspot, and where she'd like to expand globally down the road (the climates may surprise you). Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Canadian Bitcoin Miner Hut 8 Is Heading West

articles.description: Move over, DeFi—ReFi is coming? Gitcoin founder Kevin Owocki has stepped away from DeFi grant-giving machine Gitcoin as it fully decentralizes and is now focused on regenerative finance (huh?) and ReFi incubator Supermodular. He aims to "regenerate the regenerators." He explained it all to Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly, and also talks DAO structure, crypto factions, NFT use cases, his book "Greenpilled," and much more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Kevin Owocki Wants to Regenerate DeFi

articles.description: Aurory executive producer and head of production Jonathan Campeau tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC about how the first-generation of Web3 games came out of DeFi and are now evolving.
articles.title: Why Aurory's Head of Production Left Ubisoft for Web3

articles.description: With roughly 50 video games in its pipeline, Gala Games is all-in on Web3. Gala's President of Blockchain Jason Brink told Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC about the studio's ethos and weighs in on the different approaches to Web3 gaming.
articles.title: 'We Don't Really Do the Corporate Thing Very Well' Says Jason Brink on Gala Games Approach

articles.description: Paul Grewal is the Chief Legal Officer at Coinbase and a former U.S. magistrate judge in Northern California. He gave Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott his candid takes on Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX, the SEC's crackdown on staking, the sanctioning of Tornado Cash, and more alpha on how Coinbase is approaching the current unfriendly US regulatory environment. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Coinbase's Top Lawyer Gets Real on SEC

articles.description: Rotten Tomatoes founder Patrick Lee, who has led companies at the intersection of technology and entertainment from Web1 to Web3, spoke to Decrypt's Sander Lutz at Outer Edge LA about the current state of decentralized gaming, film and television.
articles.title: The Founder of Rotten Tomatoes Says Web3 Entertainment Isn’t Nearly Entertaining Enough Yet

articles.description: Gnosis first launched in 2015 as a decentralized prediction market built on Ethereum. Now it's a DAO, a multi-sig wallet, a staking chain, and a vibrant community with its own GNO governance token. Co-founder and COO Friederike Ernst talked to Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott about the careful evolution of Gnosis, decentralization impostors, account abstraction, DeFi UX failures, why Ethereum is the "Manhattan of crypto," and much more. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: How Gnosis Has Endured and Evolved

articles.description: Justin Aversano, best known for his high-selling "Twin Flames" NFT photo series, joined Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward ahead of the upcoming L.A. exhibition for his new Ethereum NFT project "Smoke and Mirrors." He shared the wild inspiration behind the tarot-themed collection, and why—despite his growing profile—he opted not to exhibit at a major brand-name gallery.
articles.title: Justin Aversano's Inspiration for Tarot-Themed NFT Photo Series 'Smoke and Mirrors'

articles.description: Former "Call of Duty" developer Rob Bowling, now head of Midnight Society Studio, checked in with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at GDC and shared some behind-the-scenes statistics on how players are enjoying "Deadrop." The game saw 90,000 player hours over the weekend, with 97 minutes average play time per player, and their community size tripled in just a few days.
articles.title: Midnight Society’s Rob Bowling Talks Deadrop Launch and Working With Dr. Disrespect
